forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: File size optimization

comments.text: Hi everyone! In v176.1 (you're on [version]), we improved how imports of changed vertices are compressed...
... causing much smaller Thing file sizes for those! Thx Flarn!
We also added an experimental file size cap of 1000kb, but need your help on tuning this -- pls check the Steam forum for the background.
(Note if any of your creations exceed this upon saving, an emergency backup is saved so the creation isn't lost.)
what was the previous file size limit? i was hitting it with a creation i was working on before
there actually wasn't any (on the client), at least not in terms of file size byte count. you might have hit a server limit, or another limit...
if you're doing it on the client, you're doing it wrong...though i guess it might be the most you can do given the current situation.
right, and we're actually doing almost all critical validations on both server and clients (but pls email us of any critical exceptions you find :))
that's funny; i was just thinking "i forgot, does philipp ever really post on the in-game boards?" because i've never seen you in world. then i saw you did literally 1 min ago. xd
i do wonder though, what are you using to post? because i don't think you're online; even unlisted users show up in the count and it just says 1 (me).
btw i actually just did email you one earlier today.
i am in my little private world, you probably checked the online count the second i left again. i'm on again right now :)
ah, okay. curious, why are you of all people unlisted? and why have i never seen you anywhere public? i don't mean to suggest you're doing anything wrong ofc; i'm merely curious.

thread.latestCommentText: ah, okay. curious, why are you of all people unlisted? and why have i never seen you anywhere public? i don't mean to suggest you're doing anything wrong ofc; i'm merely curious.
